decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: H.M. Land registry map title no. MX64046; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-01; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-02; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-03; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-04 Rev C; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-05; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-06 Rev C; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-07; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-08; Planning Design Access Statement P2; Reasonable Exemption Statement; Bat Assessment and Habitat Enhancement Report [dated 07.06.23]; 2023-Cuckoo-P2-SS1
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 5 - The window(s) in the first floor flank elevation(s) of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 6 - Provision of wildlife shelters 
 a. The development herein proposed shall not proceed beyond damp proof course level until the applicant provides to the Council for approval in writing details and drawings of the incorporation within the fabric of the extended building of:
    i. 3 Schwegler 2FR interconnecting bat tubes (or similarly durable functional equivalent) mounted side by side, to permit bats to move between them, on the southern aspect of the building at just below roof eaves level;
    ii. 2 universal bird bricks to be mounted on the eastern aspect of the building at just below roof eaves level.
 b. The applicant will install the wildlife shelters in accordance with this approval and retain them thereafter, ensuring that the entrance holes and access ways remain clear. 
 c. Prior to completion the applicant will provide to the Council photos of the provided shelters in position.

REASON: To avoid or minimise impacts on biodiversity, and to mitigate for the loss of habitat and provide net gain for biodiversity on site, in accord with Policy G6 of the London Plan (2021) and policies DM20 and DM21 of Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 7 - The development herein proposed shall not proceed beyond damp proof course level until the following has been submitted to, and approved by, the Council:

 a. Privacy screening for the rear raised patio along the flanks. 

The proposed development shall be installed and retained as per the approved details thereafter. 

REASON: The protect the privacy and amenities of the neighbouring occupiers.
description: Single and two storey side extension; single and two storey rear extension; alterations to the front elevation; raising of the main roof ridge; extended raised patio at the rear with balustrade and steps (demolition of side extension)
